thread.title: Boris Johnson says Scotland Yard's behaviour over Lord Brittan was 'completely unacceptable'
thread.title_full: Boris Johnson says Scotland Yard's behaviour over Lord Brittan was 'completely unacceptable'

author: Christopher Hope,
title: Boris Johnson says Scotland Yard's behaviour over Lord Brittan was 'completely unacceptable'
text: Politics Boris Johnson says Scotland Yard's behaviour over Lord Brittan was 'completely unacceptable' MPs said that Sir Bernard Hogan-Howe, the Metropolitan Police Commissioner, should offer a personal apology to Lord Brittan's family Boris Johnson said the delay in telling Lord Brittan's family he had been cleared was "completely unacceptable" Photo: Chris Jackson/Getty Images By Christopher Hope, , Martin Evans and Steven Swinford 10:00PM BST 08 Oct 2015
